articles.author: Tom Westbrook
articles.title: Stocks mixed, sterling weighed as UK inflation slows - Reuters.com
articles.description: Stock markets were mixed on Wednesday with growth concerns dragging down China while elsewhere futures rose after British inflation came in surprisingly soft for once and U.S. data stoked hopes the world's biggest economy can avoid recession.
articles.content: SYDNEY, July 19 (Reuters) - Stock markets were mixed on Wednesday with growth concerns dragging down China while elsewhere futures rose after British inflation came in surprisingly soft for once and … [+3367 chars]

articles.content: Diablo 4's first live season, known as the Season of the Malignant, is mere days away from launch, and Blizzard has released a hefty patch to prepare for its coming. Amongst many, many changes (the p… [+1124 chars]

articles.author: Stacy Liberatore
articles.title: This is what the Earth and moon look like from Mars - Daily Mail
articles.description: ESA's Mars orbiter has been circling the Red Planet for 20 years and took a moment to look back home. The probe captured a rare view of the moon circling our planet 186.4 million miles away.
articles.content:
To the uninitiated, they may look like fuzzy white dots and blobs on a gray background. 
But what you're looking at is actually an incredibly rare snap of the Earth and the moon taken on Mars - 187 … [+5265 chars]
